# Ethers.js

In this section we are going to learn about [Ethers.js](https://docs.ethers.org/v5/)

## Accounts

First, we are going to see the balance of **ETH** of an address.

```js
$ node 1_accounts.js

 Address (0xBE0eB53F46cd790Cd13851d5EFf43D12404d33E8): 1996008.284510220214933319 ETH
```

## Read Smart Contracts

Then, we are going to read the info of an **Smart Contract**, in this case [DAI](https://etherscan.io/address/0x6B175474E89094C44Da98b954EedeAC495271d0F) ERC20 Token.

```js
$ node 2_read_smart_contract.js
Smart Contract Address:  0x6B175474E89094C44Da98b954EedeAC495271d0F
Name: Dai Stablecoin
Symbol: DAI
Total Supply: 5408394339.74675294518836069 DAI
Balance of Coinbase: 3279938.515143894848865001 DAI
```

## Send Signed Transactions

Let's transfer `ethers` from one account to another in **Ganache**.

```js
$ node 3_send_signed_transactions.js
Sender Balance Before: 9888.97229328 ETH
Receiver Balance Before: 10111.0 ETH
{
  nonce: 4,
  gasPrice: BigNumber { _hex: '0x04a817c800', _isBigNumber: true },
  gasLimit: BigNumber { _hex: '0x5208', _isBigNumber: true },
  to: '0xFFcf8FDEE72ac11b5c542428B35EEF5769C409f0',
  value: BigNumber { _hex: '0x06046f37e5945c0000', _isBigNumber: true },
  data: '0x',
  chainId: 1337,
  v: 2709,
  r: '0x7be28bbc278f413068449381dc1af9d99e5d5ee799657fb15841b6b9c6314e57',
  s: '0x0050535689b9ea98420d98803123993bf11d3ecb1e6868b760de824f30c98019',
  from: '0x90F8bf6A479f320ead074411a4B0e7944Ea8c9C1',
  hash: '0xfab8f2c8450c56856144aadc2a6dfbc159c09ce570aa63ca1c807f36e5782378',
  type: null,
  confirmations: 0,
  wait: [Function (anonymous)]
}
Sender Balance After: 9777.97187328 ETH
Receiver Balance After: 10222.0 ETH
```

## Write Smart Contracts

Now, deploy the `customERC20.sol` Smart Contract to **Ganache** to send our custom tokens from one account to another...

```js
$ node 4_write_contract.js
Decimals: 18
Balance Before (0x90F8bf6A479f320ead074411a4B0e7944Ea8c9C1): 1 Tokens
{
  nonce: 7,
  gasPrice: BigNumber { _hex: '0x04a817c800', _isBigNumber: true },
  gasLimit: BigNumber { _hex: '0x8ffa', _isBigNumber: true },
  to: '0x5b1869D9A4C187F2EAa108f3062412ecf0526b24',
  value: BigNumber { _hex: '0x00', _isBigNumber: true },
  data: '0xa9059cbb000000000000000000000000ffcf8fdee72ac11b5c542428b35eef5769c409f00000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000de0b6b3a7640000',
  chainId: 1337,
  v: 2710,
  r: '0x0acc602d9c8d50162f80dff969d1d7cf7589ce8db3012b5b6d1580b4bd1386c9',
  s: '0x68bd5c0621d0d282fc6eefffe418f3114f4374ec12010bad54838db5f7d1c8c6',
  from: '0x90F8bf6A479f320ead074411a4B0e7944Ea8c9C1',
  hash: '0x4070da4f1d0927c7a0fb1b3c02d988e1ece61da56bce141cc614dce0c9bd5553',
  type: null,
  confirmations: 0,
  wait: [Function (anonymous)]
}
Balance After (0x90F8bf6A479f320ead074411a4B0e7944Ea8c9C1): 0 Tokens
Balance Account2 (0xFFcf8FDEE72ac11b5c542428B35EEF5769C409f0): 2 Tokens
```

## Events

Let's see the **Transfer event** from the pasts transactions on the **Ethereum** Blockchain...

```js
$ node 5_contract_event_stream.js
16863242
[
  {
    blockNumber: 16863241,
    blockHash: '0x21e94994b37d158a460f6161eca447e739e841297a47c739d9e9bbcb47fcd52e',
    transactionIndex: 97,
    removed: false,
    address: '0x6B175474E89094C44Da98b954EedeAC495271d0F',
```

## Inspecting Blocks

Finally, inspect the latest block to see all the info...

```js
$ node 6_inspecting_blocks.js
Block Number: 16863250
{
  hash: '0x394c7c587cc86fad80f05ec4ecb2272e8d655c6019e2ccca6ca74cbfddc5d725',
  parentHash: '0x0f05fcc188c42bac9e0bd6230e7356b2b716d0e57239e83bc3f365a3dcb82963',
  number: 16863250,
  timestamp: 1679246999,
  nonce: '0x0000000000000000',
  difficulty: 0,
  gasLimit: BigNumber { _hex: '0x01c9c380', _isBigNumber: true },
  gasUsed: BigNumber { _hex: '0x01162c8d', _isBigNumber: true },
  miner: '0xbd3Afb0bB76683eCb4225F9DBc91f998713C3b01',
  extraData: '0x4275696c644149202868747470733a2f2f6275696c6461692e6e657429',
  transactions: [
    '0x8aab02fae894f158ed3b358c9229d01d2d49e6a7d878d8ec6a4bb632ab77c888',
    '0x64342f9f7aff0e9e56cc6bc7e443ae50515cb5e89d6b4108b8a5b7b8e159e783',
```
